name: AUGenericView
desc: A view that provides a generic user interface for a Cocoa audio unit.

items.name: init(audioUnit: AudioUnit)
items.desc: Creates a generic view for an audio unit, setting all display flags.

items.name: init(audioUnit: AudioUnit, displayFlags: AUGenericViewDisplayFlags)
items.desc: Initializes a generic view for an audio unit, setting specific display flags.

items.name: var showsExpertParameters: Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether or not controls for expert audio unit parameters are displayed in the generic view.

items.name: var audioUnit: AudioUnit
items.desc: The audio unit associated with the generic view.
